column3: Rate of National Drug Overdose Deaths, by Demographic
Source: National Center on Health Statistics, CDC WONDER

column2: 1 Any Opioid ICD-10 codes: T40.0-T40.4, T40.6
3Other Synthetic Opioids (mainly fentanyl) ICD-10 Code: T40.4
